title: Collaborative Code Editor
description: A mock e-commerce frontend built with React and Bootstrap.
Features: Developed a multi-user, real-time code editor enabling collaborative programming with instant code synchronization, in-room chat, and live user presence tracking.
Implemented features such as syntax highlighting, file/folder operations, code execution, AI-assisted code suggestions, and collaborative sketching using WebSockets.
Enabled room-based collaboration with unique room IDs, user notifications, customizable themes, and seamless multi-language support for a tailored coding experience.

title: Event Management Platform
description: A personal portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS.
detail: A full-stack Event Management Platform designed to streamline the process of event creation, registration, tracking, and management for both users and administrators. Built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js), this platform ensures a seamless, secure, and efficient event experience.
Features: Developed a role-based platform supporting event creation, registration, attendance tracking, and real-time analytics for users and admins.
Implemented secure JWT authentication, real-time status handling, and an intuitive dashboard to streamline user interaction and admin control.
Focused on clean code structure, modular component design, and UI responsiveness using Bootstrap and React for optimal usability.

title: Tourism Website
description: A full-stack blog platform using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
detail: A Tourism platform designed to help users discover new destinations, plan their travels, and explore popular places in India. The platform allows users to search for specific locations and get a curated list of famous places nearby, making it easier to explore hidden gems and top tourist spots.
Features: Engineered a full-stack tourism web application enabling users to discover top destinations in India through real-time search and curated content.
Designed and developed a fully responsive UI using React and Bootstrap to enhance cross-device usability and user experience.
Built a RESTful backend with Express.js and MongoDB to efficiently manage location data, user interactions, and dynamic content delivery.
